remarks:
If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph -> ps ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 24-Jan-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Mel L. O'Cat, 3-Mar-2008.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 1-Jan-2018.) 

---

 If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph -> ps ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by O'Cat, 3-Mar-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hbim.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hbim.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
hbim $p |- ( ( ph -> ps ) -> A. x ( ph -> ps ) ) $.
